thread.title: Victims of cyber crime should be 'low priority' if they fail to take security steps, says report
thread.title_full: Victims of cyber crime should be 'low priority' if they fail to take security steps, says report

author: David Barrett
title: Victims of cyber crime should be 'low priority' if they fail to take security steps, says report
text: Crime Victims of cyber crime should be 'low priority' if they fail to take security steps, says report ​Official study backed by City of London Police suggests 'hard decisions' should be made if victims admit they did not follow security advice ​ Hackers and other cyber criminals cause billions of pounds in losses a year Photo: Alamy By David Barrett , Home Affairs Correspondent 12:01AM BST 15 Oct 2015
